ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 368
ygData.msgSnippet: Back in the day when people still bought jewelry and nobody wanted to be an enchanter except for jewelry making I wouldn t enchant metals for any price for
ygData.messageBody:
Back in the day when people still bought jewelry and nobody wanted to be an enchanter except for jewelry making I wouldn't enchant metals for any price for people who were not enchanters (if they were an enchanter and just not high enough to do the metal I would do it, not lvl 1 though).  I do it now for quests only and for free.
 
Mu
-----Original Message-----
From: Jason McKnight [mailto:hyperian@...]
Sent: Friday, February 16, 2001 9:10 AM
To: eqenchanters@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 368




<< Where did everyone go after Cazic? >>
--
Mark Rafn    dagon@...    <http://www.dagon.net/>

Hi all, new to the board, first post.

Cazic on Steroids > Temple of Droga / 3rd Level of Dalnir / Charming Giants in the Giant Fort in Frontier Mountains.

Droga is usually impossible to find a pick up group within the zone. I usually bring a couple of friends and recruit in /ooc from Overthere and Frontier Mountain outdoor zones. 3rd Level of Dalnir is tough for the same reasons as above. Also, getting to the portal for non - gaters can be very tough, need a Cleric / Druid / Wizzy and Invis is a must.

Easy to get in a Giant Charming group. I've ! kept the same pet in there for a n hour plus on a few occasions. Good for refining our Charming skills.

Side note: What do you all charge to enchant metals?

Silver Bars

Electrum Bars

Gold Bars

Platinum Bars

and Later Velium Bars?

Neutron Dreamslayer - 35th Level DE Enchanter, Lanys
